english.segment1: In the quiet, in the stillness. I know that You are God. In the secret of Your presence. I know there I am restored
english.segment2: When You call I won't refuse. Each new day again I'll choose
english.segment3: There is no one else for me. None but Jesus. Crucified to set me free. Now I live to bring Him praise
english.segment4: In the chaos, in confusion. I know You're sovereign still. In the moment of my weakness. You give me grace to do Your will
english.segment5: So when You call I won't delay. This my song through all my days
english.segment6: There is no one else for me. None but Jesus. Crucified to set me free. Now I live to bring Him praise
english.segment7: All my delight is in You, Lord. All of my hope, all of my strength. All my delight is in You, Lord, forevermore
